alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 7:17PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL TULARE COUNTY THROUGH 800 PM PDT... At 717 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of East Porterville, or 12 miles southeast of Porterville, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Porterville, East Porterville, Strathmore, Poplar-Cotton Center, and Springville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Foothills; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
